name: Mermaid Land
description: Mermaid Land is an underwater adventure that will train your brain! Help little mermaid to find the treasures: plunge into the ocean and start an incredible journey - play match-3 puzzles and win them all!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1Gb DirectX 9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
